title: Crispy Chicken with Honey Dipping Sauce

instructions.1: Mix salad dressing, honey, mustard and peanut butter. Remove 1/2 cup of the salad dressing mixture; set remaining aside.
instructions.2: Brush chicken with 1/2 cup of the salad dressing mixture; coat with crushed chips. Place on greased cookie sheet.
instructions.3: Bake at 425 degrees F for 9 minutes. Turn. Bake an additional 4 to 5 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and lightly browned. Serve with remaining salad dressing mixture as dipping sauce.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the chicken from Step 2 being used?
Is salad dressing from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is chicken from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is salad dressing from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
Is salad dressing mixture live after Step 1?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 2, is it still valid to cook the chicken in Step 3?
Can we mix (Step 1) and bake (Step 3) at the same time?
